title: Logged in from Elsewhere
body: I've twice now received a notification stating that my account has been logged onto from a different location. I'd like to change my password, however I no longer have access to the email I made my account with. I can't change my email . . without my old email. Some help, please?

replies.body: No worries, we can help to recover your account and restore your email.  Reach out to us in a support ticket, and our account team can help with that.  I also recommend checking our[ account recovery ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account)guide in preparation of questions you might be asked to verify account ownership.  We'll respond asap!
